publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4160 Mary Scanlon: Support Your Local Shops Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Northern Scot on its "Support Your Local Shops" campaign; notes the success of the campaign in generating support for small retailers across Moray; notes that independent retailers across Scotland make a unique and irreplaceable contribution to the character and quality of our local towns and villages, and further notes that just a few pounds out of an average weekly shopping budget spent locally could make a huge difference to the future success of small businesses and local town centres.
S2M-4160 Support Your Local Shops Campaign (lodged on 21 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4160 Mary Scanlon: Support Your Local Shops Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Northern Scot on its "Support Your Local Shops" campaign; notes the success of the campaign in generating support for small retailers across Moray; notes that independent retailers across Scotland make a unique and irreplaceable contribution to the character and quality of our local towns and villages, and further notes that just a few pounds out of an average weekly shopping budget spent locally could make a huge difference to the future success of small businesses and local town centres. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
